name: Spoider
description:
Birds are taking over! As a spider, it is your job to clean up the city of the avian menace.

Would highly recommend downloading to play, as the WebGL build can run unreliable and with audio glitches. Movement is a little bit glitchy, so if you can, avoid jumping off tall buildings and place down webs slowly. 

We really had fun experimenting with procedural animation and boids. With that, I hope it is an interesting proof of concept for a viable game. Hope you enjoy!
